SEARCH
Package controller

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.TicketController
All Implemented Interfaces:
TicketDAO
public class TicketController extends Controller implements TicketDAO
Controller class for handling operations related to tickets. Implements the TicketDAO interface to provide data access methods for tickets. This class uses the singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance of the controller exists.

Example usage: 

 TicketController controller = TicketController.getInstance();
 boolean isCreateTicketSuccessful = controller.createTicket(ticket);
See Also:
  • TicketDAO
  • Ticket
  • DatabaseConnector

      public static TicketController getInstance()

      the singleton instance of TicketController

    • getAllJoin

      public ResultSet getAllJoin(String ticketId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a ticket and its related entities by the ticket ID. Joins multiple tables to get comprehensive ticket details.
      Specified by:
      getAllJoin in interface TicketDAO
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the ID of the ticket to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the joined ticket data
